verses.name: Proverbs 20:1
verses.text: Wine is a mocker, strong drink is raging: and whosoever is deceived thereby is not wise.

verses.name: Proverbs 20:2
verses.text: The fear of a king is as the roaring of a lion: whoso provoketh him to anger sinneth against his own soul.

verses.name: Proverbs 20:3
verses.text: It is an honour for a man to cease from strife: but every fool will be meddling.

verses.name: Proverbs 20:4
verses.text: The sluggard will not plow by reason of the cold; therefore shall he beg in harvest, and have nothing.

verses.name: Proverbs 20:5
verses.text: Counsel in the heart of man is like deep water; but a man of understanding will draw it out.
